title: Holiday Entertaining: Cocktail Party Cheese Balls! @ Murray's Cheese - December 12
desc: No cocktail party is complete without a classic spreadable cheese ball. Ditch the neon-colored grocery store version and up your entertaining game with our DIY cheese ball making class. We'll explore a variety of enticing combinations with cheese, fruit, nuts and herbs. Savory, sweet or spicy, there's a cheese ball for every party!
